summary:
This also started out as a mod for Oblivion.
This mod uses my gemstones to create four different rings. The Emerald Gold Ring, Ruby Gold Ring, Sapphire Gold Ring, and Jocelyn Gold Ring and all are created at the forge. This is meant as an add-on to compliment my other mod Jocelyn's Blade.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Calibri][color=rgb(255,255,255)][size=3]This also started out as a mod for Oblivion.

[/size][/color][/font][color=rgb(255,255,255)]This mod uses my gemstones to create four different rings. The Emerald Gold Ring, Ruby Gold Ring, Sapphire Gold Ring, and Jocelyn
Gold Ring and all are created at the forge.

This is meant as an add-on to compliment my other mod Jocelyn's Blade.[/color]
author: TAJocelyn
